name: outlook-add-in-sso-naa
title: Outlook add-in with SSO using nested app authentication
shortDescription: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an Outlook add-in by using nested app authentication.
longDescription: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an Outlook add-in by using nested app authentication.

references.name: Enable SSO in an Office Add-in using nested app authentication
references.description: Learn how to enable SSO in an Office Add-in using nested app authentication.
